notice.label: $t(common:label.privacyNotice)
notice.text:
Please note that all of your delegated receiving addresses include your stake key. 
When you share a delegated receive address, the recipient can search the blockchain using your stake key to locate 
all addresses associated with your wallet and also discover your wallet balance and transaction history.

delegated.headline: External addresses (delegated)
delegated.caption: These addresses are delegated to a stake pool (if you in fact delegated this account).

delegated.headline: Internal change addresses (delegated)
delegated.caption:
These addresses are delegated to a stake pool (if you in fact delegated this account).
Don't share internal addresses, always give out external addresses.

enterprise.headline: Internal change addresses (not delegated)
enterprise.caption:
These addresses are not delegated.
Don't share internal addresses, always give out external addresses.
